content:
I reviewed the workflow pattern changes powerpoint from the WGM.

  • Add Request.insurance as 0..* is still being triaged as far as I can tell.
  • the rest of the changes have been voted upon and I am assuming the workgroups should review all these for the various resources and update them as needed so are ready by December?
@Lloyd McKenzie Is that file complete? I only see 38 kb and 2 slides
There will be a couple of further changes discussed on our call today.
